> Concept ACK (if this passes CI)

Note that in the CI we only run the security checks in a single macOS job. It's near impossible to run them in any of the others given the semi-constantly changing environment, which doesn't match Guix.
@fanquake That's a bit unfortunate, but makes sense. Maybe some day we can do a guix build in the CI.
